fruit.description: Very fragrant taste, the blackberry has a taste both sweet and sour. Depending on the variety, this delicious fruit par excellence, is more or less dark purple in color.
fruit.name: Andean raspberry

fruit.description: This fruit is very appreciated for its pink flesh and its sweet taste. It evokes the sweet scent of the tropics.
fruit.name: Guava

fruit.description: Its tangy and refreshing flavor, transports us to the Andes Cordilleras in Latin America where this fruit is grown. The lulo is consumed mainly in juice.
fruit.name: Lulo

fruit.description: Native to the Andean Cordilleras in South America, this fragrant, slightly sweet and at the same time tangy fruit.
fruit.name: Mandarin orange

fruit.description: Its tender, juicy and very fragrant pulp offers us a sweet taste with a delicate acidulous taste.
fruit.name: Mango

fruit.description: Aromatic and very juicy, this fruit is native to the Amazon basin. It has a sweet and slightly acidic flavor that offers new sensations to your palate.
fruit.name: Maracuja

fruit.description: Its flesh is juicy, sweet and delicately flavored.
fruit.name: Papaya

fruit.description: Its juicy pulp of exotic aroma and its refreshing, fruity and sweet taste allow it to be easily combined with other fruits.
fruit.name: Pineapple

fruit.description: Its pulp is creamy, of soft flavor, very perfumed and sweet.
fruit.name: Soursop

fruit.description: This fragrant fruit, slightly sweet and at the same time sour. It is produced all year round mainly in Ecuador and Colombia in areas of altitude from 1000 to 2000 meters.
fruit.name: Tamarillo
